DarkMouse::

After another hour, she had finished disecting the other bot. Pleased 
with her work, she called a few maintenance drones to help her put 
the usable parts away in the repair bay.  
She walked with the drones and monitored them as they put the parts 
away for future use. Well, parts were parts and wires were wires, she 
reasoned. It was all useable and in fairly good condition. She had 
the rest of the bots tossed into the recycling bin for scrap. 
She smiled and looked around the repair bay. "Not bad for a mouse who 
came back." she said quitely to herself.

WHile looking around the bay, she thought about going outside for a 
walk. "Yeah, that's not a bad idea," she said to herself.
She opened the bay door to the outside and looked out. A breath of 
fresh air won't hurt the old exchangers any, she thought.  So she 
walked outside and enjoyed the ability to scurry around again. 
She had to jump down from the entrance plank to the ground below.  
She jumped, landed, rolled and then got up. Dusting herself off, she 
smiled. "Yeah, still got the touch." She transformed into mouse mode 
and went for a leasurely stroll around the ship. 

The maximal signature chip inside her had moved around when she 
landed on the ground. It moved and sat next to a small circuit board. 
A small arc of electricity came up and hit the chip. It activated. So 
now, her body showed up as a predacon and maximal signature. Only she 
didn't know it. Nor did she see the weapons on the ship take aim at 
her new maximal signature.  The security system armed itself and 
prepared to fire on her.
